suppress.notes: Vulnerability applies to gradle before 6, project uses 6
Vulnerability applies to Spring Framework 5.0.5, project uses 5.2.0
Vulnerability applies to Netty before version 4.1.42, project uses 4.1.42
Vulnerability applies Eclipse Jetty. Default unhandled Error response content does not escape Exception messages in stacktraces included in error output.
A prototype pollution vulnerability in handlebars is exploitable if an attacker can control the template
suppress.vulnerabilityName: A prototype pollution vulnerability in handlebars is exploitable if an attacker can control the template
